# Spring Boot REST API for Kubernetes Deployment

This project is a Spring Boot REST API designed for testing and deployment on Kubernetes.

## Project Structure
- Maven-based Spring Boot application
- RESTful API endpoints for CRUD operations
- Docker containerization support
- Kubernetes deployment manifests
- Environment-specific configurations

## Key Components
- REST Controllers for API endpoints
- Service layer for business logic
- Data models for entities
- Docker support for containerization
- K8s manifests for deployment

## Development Guidelines
- Use Spring Boot best practices
- Follow RESTful API design principles
- Include proper error handling
- Add logging and monitoring capabilities
- Ensure cloud-native compatibility
